root.title: commerc bancorp coba file offer
root.body: commerc bancorp inc sai file registr statement secur exchang commiss 575,000 share seri b cumul prefer stock offer includ 75,000 share cover allot commerc sai bank subsidiari will us proce support plan growth gener corpor purpos bank hold compani sai share prefer stock initi will convert on share commerc common stock commerc sai prefer share will price rang 20 22 dlr share propos sale public commenc earli mid april commerc sai butcher singer inc will offer manag underwrit
